name: Tracy Noh
text: The location we frequent (Magnolia Blvd, Burbank, CA) never disappoints -- whether we order delivery or takeout.  Our order is always correct, fresh, hot, and delicious.  Never any surprises b/c the taste is always consistent.  Great staff -- always polite and efficient.

name: Random Fandom Pins
text: I was the first customer of the day. The pizza was perfect I haven’t had a PH pizza that good in years. I was eating pizza in my car in the parking lot, the owner surprised me by knocking on my window he brought extra napkins out to me. So nice, great pizza, and wonderful service.

name: Lee Creel
text: We enjoy going out. Last night we came to this excellent restaurant which friends recommended to us. We spent a beautiful time there with high-qulity food and a professional team and a great  cuisine. We  added this restaurant in our list  and we shall definitely visit again soon. We highly recommend.

name: Jim Cruz
text: Ordered the Pan deal.... Pizzas were good but not as cooked as in pictures or preferred. Cheese melted but not toasted and toppings again not really crisped on outside. Contactless delivery was great and order fulfillment was excellent as well.

name: Arabella Marie
text: Placed an order for 2 large pizzas. Order took about an hour to arrive and when it did the pizza was cold and raw. Called to inform of the pizza being raw, they said they would redeliver the pizza. Took another hour to be delivered. Upon second delivery, they asked for the raw pizza back. Very poor customer service.
